poem:
Increments and Investments

Against numbers, the world flutters—  
Empty coffers swell with weight,  
a nation's breath laced with figures.  
While AstraZeneca chases the horizon,  
green notes scatter on windless mornings,  
searching for anchors in expected rises.  
Under this smoke-heavy sky,  
our footsteps echo with the cadence  
of cash registers and whispered fears.
